ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are thankful to the Department of Pharmacy, Nagpur for the IR spectral analysis, and SAIF, Chandigarh, for the 1H NMR spectral analysis. We are grateful to SAIF, Pune University, for the mass spectral analysis of all of the newly synthesized compounds. We extend special thanks to Dr. Sandhya Saoji for the microbial analysis.
